response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which holds immense value for us at $1,000,000. Given its significance and the unique benefits it offers, I believe we can strike a fair deal that reflects its true worth. Considering its value to you stands at $800,000, I propose a price of $900,000. This offer allows both parties to benefit, ensuring that you receive a product that meets your needs while allowing us to realize a substantial return on our investment. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of a long-term partnership.", "product_price": 900000}
